# resolve_pr_parallel

Resolve all PR comments using parallel processing. Use when addressing PR review feedback, resolving review threads, or batch-fixing PR comments.

## Quick Facts
- id: `resolve-pr-parallel--751b2f43e5`
- worth_using_score: `60/100`
- tags: `github, ci`
- source: `codex_skills`
- source_path: `/home/wolvend/.codex/skills/resolve-pr-parallel/SKILL.md`

## Workflow / Steps
- Code changes requested
- Questions to answer
- Style/convention fixes
- Test additions needed
- Task pr-comment-resolver(comment1)
- Task pr-comment-resolver(comment2)
- Task pr-comment-resolver(comment3)
- Commit changes with a clear message referencing the PR feedback
- Resolve each thread programmatically:
- Push to remote
